subtitle.part1: A smart way to keep tracking of your health.
subtitle.part2: Take care of your body, it’s the only place you have to live.

box1.title: Store your blood type easily
box1.description: You don't need to remember your blood type. Mediheart will do it for you once and for all.

box2.title: Keep your medical records
box2.description: Add your new info in a easy way. Your medical records are now up to date.

box3.title: Share info with your doctor securely
box3.description: When it's time for your appointment, share your medical records with your doctor.

intermediateSection.title: Keep track of your health information
intermediateSection.subtitle: An online Personal Health Records service that you can use to keep track of information from your doctor visits, tests and procedures.

Signup.title: Sign up with your e-mail address

rules.password: with at least one capital letter, a number and a special character

Signup.termsConditionsError: You must accept the terms and conditions to sign up

UserHomepage.subtitle: Keep an eye on your blood exams
